mean_cn: adj. 多愁善感的，伤感的
mean_en: producing emotions such as pity, romantic love or sadness, which may be too strong or not appropriate; feeling these emotions too much
sentence: Every time he hears this sentimental song, he is brought to tears.
sentence_trans: 每当听到这首悲情的歌时，他总会落泪。
word_etyma: senti感觉 ＋ ment表行为 ＋ al形容词后缀 → sentimental多感情的；感伤的
